sentences.sentence: The doctors gave me all these drugs that made me really spacey.
sentences.translation: 医生们给我的这些药让我迷迷糊糊的。

sentences.sentence: I saw Kevin Spacey at the last time.
sentences.translation: 我最后一次见到了凯文·史派西。

sentences.sentence: Kevin Spacey and Sharon Stone emceed the ceremony.
sentences.translation: 凯文·史派西和莎朗·斯通主持颁奖典礼。
